name: Futuristicsound the rpg. (DEMO) extremely short
description:
A boy named futuristicsound is a type of species called a sound that has abilities connected to if they feel extremely sad, happy or angry.

his planet is blown up by a time bomb that leaves only him and his siblings alive and they were sent to earth.

This is only a demo so you can't know the rest yet.

TEEHEEE.
